statements: SELECT id, crop_name, market_price, planting_season, analysis_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE crop_name = 'Potato' ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT id, crop_name, market_price FROM MarketTrends WHERE planting_season = 'Spring' ORDER BY id;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(market_price) AS avg_price FROM MarketTrends GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT id, crop_name, market_price FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY crop_name, market_price DESC;
SELECT id, crop_name, market_price, planting_season, analysis_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' ORDER BY market_price ASC;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(market_price) AS avg_price FROM MarketTrends WHERE analysis_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY crop_name;
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_season FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_price > 50.00 AND planting_season = 'Spring' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE crop_name LIKE '%apple%' OR crop_name LIKE '%orange%' ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-05-01' AND '2021-08-31';
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT id, crop_name FROM MarketTrends WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, market_price FROM MarketTrends WHERE market_price < 50 ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT AVG(planting_area) AS avg_area FROM PlantingDecisions;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM PlantingDecisions WHERE planting_area > 100 ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY crop_name DESC, market_price ASC;
SELECT crop_name, market_price FROM MarketTrends WHERE planting_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlantingDecisions WHERE planting_area > 1000 AND planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT crop_name, AVG(planting_area) AS avg_area, MAX(planting_area) AS max_area FROM PlantingDecisions GROUP BY crop_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT MarketTrends.crop_name, PlantingDecisions.planting_area FROM MarketTrends JOIN PlantingDecisions ON MarketTrends.crop_name = PlantingDecisions.crop_name ORDER BY MarketTrends.crop_name;
SELECT * FROM market_trends
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_trends ORDER BY market_price ASC
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_trends WHERE market_price > 50
SELECT * FROM planting_decisions WHERE plant_type = 'Corn'
SELECT planting_location, decision_date FROM planting_decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC
SELECT * FROM market_trends
SELECT product_name, market_price FROM market_trends ORDER BY market_price DESC
SELECT * FROM planting_decisions WHERE plant_type='Vegetables'
SELECT analysis_date, trend_description FROM market_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, product_name, market_price FROM market_trends WHERE market_price BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM crop_data;
SELECT crop_name, market_price, planting_season FROM crop_data;
SELECT * FROM market_demand ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, market_price FROM crop_data WHERE market_price > 100;
SELECT crop_id, planting_date, planting_location FROM planting_decisions WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_data;
SELECT crop_name, market_price FROM crop_data ORDER BY market_price DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_season FROM crop_data WHERE planting_season = 'Summer';
SELECT crop_name, planting_location FROM crop_data INNER JOIN planting_decisions ON crop_data.crop_id = planting_decisions.crop_id;
SELECT crop_name, market_growth_rate FROM crop_data INNER JOIN market_analysis ON crop_data.crop_id = market_analysis.crop_id WHERE market_analysis.analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MarketSize;
SELECT market_name, market_size FROM MarketSize ORDER BY market_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlantingDecisions WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM PlantingDecisions WHERE harvest_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT market_id, trend_description FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM MarketSize WHERE market_size > 5000 ORDER BY market_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT trend_id, trend_description, trend_date FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT variety_id, crop_name, variety_name FROM CropVarieties WHERE planting_season = 'Spring' ORDER BY crop_name, variety_name;
SELECT market_name, market_size FROM MarketSize WHERE market_size < 1000 OR market_id = 3;
SELECT decision_id, crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM PlantingDecisions WHERE planting_date > '2022-06-01' AND planting_date < '2022-08-31';
